values.name: Text
values.value:
We captured him inside a lit pumpkin so he can't Escape.
With this the world is saved and all thanks to you Baldur
We the Lumen thank you for saving us.

values.name: Text
values.value:
I hope my upgrades helped you throug the dark!
and thank you for saving the Village

values.name: Text
values.value: No Problem but without you, Dargan and Ziya, i wouldn't have done this.
